## KeyboardManager.register() method

Register a keyboard event listener.

**Signature:**

```typescript
register(callback: KeyboardCallback): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callback | KeyboardCallback | The callback function. |

void
